faq.title: FAQs

faq.description: We're here to help. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
faq.title: Frequently asked questions

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Rihigo. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using Rihigo, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.service: refers to the Rihigo platform, including our website, mobile applications, and all related services.
definitions.user: refers to any individual who accesses or uses our Service.
definitions.booking: refers to any reservation made through our platform for activities, tours, accommodations, or other services.
definitions.vendor: refers to third-party service providers who offer their services through our platform.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content: By using our Service, you agree to:
useOfService.item1: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account or making a booking
useOfService.item2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
useOfService.item3: Use the Service only for lawful purposes
useOfService.item4: Not attempt to interfere with or disrupt the Service

bookings.title: Bookings and Payments
bookings.content: When you make a booking through Rihigo:
bookings.item1: You agree to pay all fees and charges associated with your booking
bookings.item2: Prices are subject to change and are confirmed at the time of booking
bookings.item3: Payment processing is handled securely through our third-party payment providers

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: Cancellation policies vary by vendor and activity. Please review the specific cancellation policy for each booking before confirming. Rihigo will process refunds according to the applicable cancellation policy. Some bookings may be non-refundable.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Rihigo acts as an intermediary between users and vendors. We are not responsible for the quality, safety, or legality of the services provided by vendors. To the maximum extent permitted by law, Rihigo shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of significant changes by posting a notice on our website. Your continued use of the Service after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Rihigo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as information collected automatically:
collection.item1: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:
usage.item2: Communicate with you about your reservations and our services
usage.item4: Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your information with:
sharing.item3: Service providers who assist in operating our platform

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
rights.item1: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
rights.item3: Request deletion of your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
